title: Tabi
summaries: The Tabi is a Hardmode, post-Plantera accessory which has 8.33*1/12 (8.33%) / 15.97*23/144 (15.97%) chance to drop from Bone Lee in the post-Plantera Dungeon. It allows the player to perform a dash by double-tapping the horizontal movement key. The dash ability has a one-second cooldown between uses.

statistics.Tooltip:
Allows the ability to dash
Double tap a direction
statistics.Sell: 3
